our storycommitted to innovate

T&C Garments is a joint venture company founded by Egyptian Tolba Group and Turkish Tay Group . Established in 2010, we specialize in manufacturing denim garments for leading global brands.

Read more

Our valuesguiding principles

Solution Oriented

Our solution oriented team always has a positive approach from the smallest to largest demand or obstacle, and acts without delay.

Equality

Employees are treated with utmost respect and offered equal opportunities. We have set up a fair reward system for their efforts.

Adding Value

We protect the rights of our clients and partners. We contribute to their business and services by adding value.

Environmentally
Responsible

In compliance with global environmental standards, our production facilities have recreation areas and ETP (Effluent Treatment Plan) for long-term maintenance of the ecosystem components and functions.

Sustainability

We protect the rights of our clients and partners. We contribute to their business and services by adding value.

Transparency

Transparency is integral in every aspect of our business, we operate and manage in an open, communicable and accountable manner.

operation processour core business

Our operation process consists of marketing and sales, pre-production, manufacturing and post-production. We take pride in our state of the art technology and highly skilled manufacturing team.

OUR IMPACTSUSTAINABILITY

As a business we are committed to serve the environment and society as a whole. We ultimately believe in a world where companies will only succeed if they address global issues such as poverty and climate change.
